text: Comparing #MAGA Rallies to #BlackLivesMatter protests in terms of #COVID19 risk is the new false equivalency. As a doctor I see unique public health risk with a #TrumpRally, which is why he’s making attendees sign waivers absolving him of liability if they get it. Some facts: 1/8
